sub_topic: Calculating the circumference of a circle.
message_1: A circular pizza has a diameter of 14 inches. What is the circumference of the pizza in inches?
message_2:
The circumference of a circle is given by the formula C = πd, where C is the circumference and d is the diameter. In this case, the diameter of the pizza is 14 inches. 

C = π(14) ≈ 3.14159 × 14 ≈ 43.9823 inches

The circumference of the pizza is approximately 43.98 inches.
